thread.title: Small but cozy and in a great location
thread.title_full: Small but cozy and in a great location - Review of Madeleine Haussmann Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: CGOxford
title: Small but cozy and in a great location
text:
Small rooms (normal for Paris we have found), recently upgraded, staff were very helpful and friendly. Pretty easy to walk to most attractions, lots of good restaurants close by. We would seriously recommend Le Madeleine C - one of the hidden restaurant gems we believe.
Room Tip: Try to get a superior room - a little quieter See more room tips
